column2: For quite some time now you have watched the steady decline of [Root.Religion.GetName]. No longer can you sit idly by while your people suffer at the hands of zealots and madmen of [Root.Religion.GetName]. From now on you will lead your people back to the teachings of your forefathers!

column2:
One of the following must be true:
- The §YMoral Authority§! of your religion must be below §R20§!
- There must be a pagan province in your demesne that is relevant to your culture, in addition to the §YMoral Authority§! of your religion being below §R30§!
- You must be a lunatic and the §YMoral Authority§! of you religion must be below §R50§!
Convert all characters to a not Christian and not Muslim religion, based on culture. Does not affect religious heads, so the Caliphate remains. May bring older machines to their knees.
Turn the world pagan by culture. This is mostly for development.

Do you want to turn most of the world pagan? Be warned, nearly every single character will recieve an event that converts their religion and that of their personal demesne. This may bring older computers to their knees. This is an unsupported feature primarily for development use!
